#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#include <math.h>

int hunny(int a){
    int i=1;
    while(true){
        if(a/int(pow(10,i))!=0)
            i=i+1;
        else break;
    }
    return i;
}


void addition(int a,int b,int lengtha,int lengthb){
    int i=1,j,sum=0,reverseSum=0,length;
    //for(i=1;i<=lengtha;i++){
    while(a/i!=0){
        sum = sum + (((a%(int(pow(10,i))))/(int(pow(10,i-1))))*(int( pow(10,lengtha - i)))) + (((b%(int(pow(10,i))))/(int(pow(10,i-1))))*(int( pow(10,lengthb - i))));
        
        i++;
    }
    
    i=1;
    length = hunny(sum);
    while(sum/i!=0){
        reverseSum = reverseSum + (((sum%(int(pow(10,i))))/(int(pow(10,i-1))))*(int( pow(10,length - i))));
        
        i=i+1;
    }
    
    cout<< reverseSum<<endl;
    
}


int main()
{
    int testcases,a,lengtha,lengthb,b;
    cin>>testcases;
    while(testcases--){
        cin>>a;
        cin >> b;
        if(hunny(a)>hunny(b))
        addition(a,b,hunny(a),hunny(b));
        else addition(b,a,hunny(b),hunny(a));
        
    }
    
    
    
    
    return 0;
}
